<S%H3651>'Therefore,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H188>"Woe<s%> to the <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> To the <S%H5518>pot<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> there is <S%H2457>rust<s%> And whose <S%H2457>rust<s%> has not <S%H3318>gone<s%> out of it! <S%H3318>Take<s%> out of it <S%H5409>piece<s%> after <S%H5409>piece,<s%> <S%H3808>Without<s%> <S%H5307>making<s%> a <S%H1486>choice.<s%>

<S%H602>"Groan<s%> <S%H1826>silently;<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H60>mourning<s%> for the <S%H4191>dead.<s%> <S%H2280>Bind<s%> on your <S%H6287>turban,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> your <S%H5275>shoes<s%> on your <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and do not <S%H5844>cover<s%> [your] <S%H8222>mustache,<s%> and do not <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H376>men.<s%>"
